definition: a person who takes part in an armed rebellion against the constituted authority (especially in the hope of improving conditions), take part in a rebellion
details:
noun
- a person who takes part in an armed rebellion against the constituted authority (especially in the hope of improving conditions)
= synonyms: insurgent
- someone who exhibits great independence in thought and action
= synonyms: maverick
verb
- take part in a rebellion
= synonyms: rise
- break with established customs
= synonyms: renegade
